document.full_text: at least 27 people were killed this weekend in a guatemalan village near the border with mexico in one of the worst mass killings in a generation, local police said.
document.title: 27 killed in guatemala massacre near mexico border
lines_and_colors: at least 27 people were killed this weekend in a guatemalan village near the border with mexico in one of the worst mass killings in a generation, local police said.
